cards.title: Self-Hosted Option for Enhanced Privacy
cards.description: Explore a heightened level of security and privacy with our self-hosted solution. Gain complete control over your data and customize your environment for a personalized and secure user experience.

cards.title: Total Control Over Your Data
cards.description: Neferdata's dedication to empowering users with complete authority and oversight of their data within the platform, ensuring transparency, privacy, and personalized control over their information.

cards.title: Customization for a Tailored Environment
cards.description: Neferdata's focus on providing personalized and adaptable solutions that cater to each user's specific needs and preferences, including AI-generated recommendations and deployment options for a customized experience.
